entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Disable page command buttons #18169
  • Topmost Page #18168
  • Facing issue with firebase bitcode:App store denied my app show following error #18162
  • Toggling FlyoutLayoutBehavior on Android causes the app to crash #18161
    Backlog
  • [regression/7.0.0] Label measuring seems to break the parent layout width #18160
    Backlog
  • .NET MAUI - Redirecting to AppShell page throws "Can not perform this action after onsaveinstancestate" exception #18159
    Backlog
  • FlyoutPage does not respond to changes in the FlyoutLayoutBehavior property #18158
    Backlog
  • DisplayActionSheet doesn't show up on macOS #18156
    Backlog
  • Random crashes on iOS when navigating #18153
    Backlog
  • [WinUI] shell doesn't navigate to bottom tabs from subpage #18135
    Backlog
  • [iOS, Mac, Windows] Color changes are not reflected in the Rectangle shapes #18131
    .NET 8 GA
  • [WinUI MAUI8] Incorrect size of first item with Border in CollectionView #18128
    .NET 8 GA
  • Editor control Text color is not updated properly on Windows platform #18127
    Backlog
  • MAUI When clicking blank and the keyboard is hidden, Entry does not have corresponding processing events And Xamarin can handle. #18125
    Backlog
  • MAUI application shows the telemetry log as XAMARIN APP #18124
  • MultiBinding Throwing Object reference not set to an instance of an object. #18123
    .NET 8 GA

Closed

  • Windows App SDK code and user confirm method is correct to set WriteableBitmap pixels and working in Windows SDK but this is broken and does not work in Maui? Maui specific issue? #18164
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.4.8333] Windows CollectionView is displayed as Grid Layout even if it should be List if initially the collectionView is not visible #17400
    .NET 8 GA
  • [regression/8.0.0] TapGestureRecognizers do not work with static methods #18165
    .NET 8 GA
  • No working method for setting BitmapImage/BitmapSource/SoftwareBitmap/WriteableBitmap pixels??? #18129
  • [MAUI8] Line is not showing #18136
    .NET 8 GA
  • .Net8 Regression - Button background does not override implicit visualstate style #18103
    .NET 8 GA
  • [NET 8.0 ANDROID] Custom ScrollView BindableProperty Not Getting Set #18142

PullRequests

Created

  • [net8.0] Update versions #18167
  • [Templates] Fix template typo #18166
    area/templates 📄
  • [net7.0] Fix iOS tests net7 #18163
  • Bump the windowsappsdk group with 2 updates #18145
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump the androidx group with 15 updates #18141
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [Android] Fix Border clipping issues #18134
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮, control-border
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #18122
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Merged

  • [WinUI] Fixes window blinking when resizing #18155
    platform/windows 🪟, area/navigation 🧭, area/desktop 🖥️, .NET 8 GA
  • [ci] Remove DeviceTests on iOS13.7 add Android 33 #18132
  • [release/8.0.1xx-rc2.1] [Windows] Fix wrong Layout from hidden CollectionView #18154
    .NET 8 GA
  • [iOS] Keep textcolor on characterspacing #17926
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-label, .NET 8 GA
  • [X] connect the right method to the event handler #18043
    .NET 8 GA
  • [Windows] Fix wrong Layout from hidden CollectionView #17659
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/collectionview 📃, s/pr-needs-author-input, .NET 8 GA
  • [net8.0] [ci] Remove DeviceTests on iOS13.7 add Android 33 #18133
  • Update dependabot.yml #18130

Updated

  • Fix 17776 #17796
    area/Xaml </>, s/pr-needs-author-input, stale, .NET 8 GA
  • Fixes BindableLayout BindingContext inheritance #17290
    area/perf 🏎️, community ✨, memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 SR1
  • Support finding nearest TFM to collect assets from #18068
    area/single project ☝️, .NET 8 GA
  • Rework the Label mappers for FormattedText #18105
    area/controls 🎮, .NET 8 GA
  • [C] Lowest specificity for propagated values #17648
    .NET 8 GA
  • [X] revert #5611 #17733
    area/Xaml </>, .NET 8 GA
  • [iOS] Fix ContentPage BackgroundImageSource not working #17789
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-pages, .NET 8 SR1
  • [Windows] Fix issue using Connectivity from a background thread #17903
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/essentials 🍞, .NET 8 SR1
  • [testing] Run tests on device #17808
    area/testing
  • MenuItem gets updated when IconImageSource changes - Fix 17210 #18119
    community ✨
  • [Android] Fix Button IconSize #16164
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button, control-image, Under Consideration
  • Fix Label Multilinetruncation (MaxLines / LineBreakMode) #14918
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-label, .NET 8 SR3
  • [Android] Allow to scroll horizontal WebView content inside TabbedPage #14320
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Fix default Switch Style #16252
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/templates 📄, area/controls 🎮, control-switch, stale, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Allow full screen videos from WebView #15472
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview, Under Consideration
  • [release/8.0.1xx-rc2.1] Set Nullable=enable in Control Samples projects #18114
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, .NET 8 GA
  • Bump Microsoft.Web.WebView2 from 1.0.2045.28 to 1.0.2088.41 #18084
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
